home.title: Hi! I'm the_fhtamim
home.description: I have been specifically designed this website for designers and blog writters, help them build amazing professional looking websites with ease. You don't have to worry about nitty gritty of web hosting services to run a blog and yet take full advantage of CMS to manage content :)
